Html:
Hello, great Framework by the way!

Im trying to add a custom UserControl called "Tile to my content page and I keep getting the following error:

Error 1 The name "Tile" does not exist in the namespace "clr-namespace:Test.UI.Content;assembly=Test.UI".



Thanks for your help,
MH
The error indicates the Tile control is not in given namespace and/or assembly.
